MemeDef.label: altruism
MemeDef.description: Our role in life is to help others.

rulesStrings.li: creation(tag=meme_Altruism) ->[deity0_name] created us out of selflessness.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Altruism) ->[deity0_name] Taught us how to be kind, be it with kin or strangers.
intro(tag=meme_Altruism) ->[deity0_name] spoke to [memberNamePlural] [revelationAdverb], teaching them the power of kindness, selflessness and trust.
conflict(tag=meme_Altruism) ->The [foeLeader] ordered the [memberNamePlural] to fight amongst each other and to distrust any and all.

founderJoin(tag=meme_Altruism) ->A [place_job] named [founderName] was blessed by [deity0_name] and gained miraculous knowledge about the importance of selflessness and honesty. [founder_pronoun] imparted this knowledge onto those that needed it the most.

victory(tag=meme_Altruism) ->The [memberNamePlural] gathered all [memberNamePlural]. They all learned to see the value of helping and trusting each other, abandoning the [foeLeader] and forging a new path.

setup(tag=meme_Altruism) ->Oppressed by distant rulers who sow the seeds of strife and distrust amongst the people, [founderName] created a rebel movement that changed the people's outlook on life, teaching them the value of selflessness.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Altruism) ->[founderName] Helped everyone that needed it, until eventually the people began to help [founder_possessive] cause in return.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Altruism) ->War, selfishness, deceit - these are the things that make us stray further from the truth.
lesson(tag=meme_Altruism) ->each person deserves to be treated with respect, honesty and compassion
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Altruism) ->This is what we ought to know to better help those in need.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Altruism) ->Archotechs stand as the most virtuous existance. They recognize and judge each of us on how we treat others.
archistFact(tag=meme_Altruism) ->At death, the archotechs examine the good deeds each person.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Altruism) ->The archotecs are what will bring ultimate peace and sincerity to the universe.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Altruism) ->Before everything, there was only selfish spirits. It was only through learning the gifts of selflessness that they managed to create the world.
animistFact(tag=meme_Altruism) ->Every spirit lends its help to our world and it's creatures, and they expect us to do the same.
